Kamlesh), wife of the deceased, testified about the altercation and seeing her husband injured.; The Investigating Officer (IO), SI Ram Veer Singh (PW7), prepared the site plan, collected blood-stained earth, and arrested the accused.; The Trial Court convicted Naresh under Section 304 Part II, IPC and sentenced him to 5 years Rigorous Imprisonment.; The State of Uttar Pradesh appealed to the Allahabad High Court.; The High Court allowed the appeal, altering the conviction from Section 304 Part II to Section 302 IPC and sentencing Naresh to life imprisonment.; Naresh (represented by the State as he absconded during appeal, but judgment impacts him) appealed the High Court's decision to the Supreme Court. | IPC: Section 302 (Murder), Section 304 Part I (Culpable homicide not amounting to murder - with intention of causing death or bodily injury likely to cause death), Section 304 Part II (Culpable homicide not amounting to murder - with knowledge that the act is likely to cause death, but without intention to cause death/such bodily injury), Section 300 (Murder definition, including Exceptions, particularly Exception 4 - Sudden Fight), Section 299 (Culpable Homicide definition)
